H.content: read from another angle, not simply a triangle
H.linkedContent: read from another angle, not simply a triangle

LOBL.content: life being drawn through by sharp dividing line, edge where it is impossible to settle: arrête, angle of instability impossible to settle (s’arrêter)
LOBL.linkedContent: life being drawn through by sharp dividing line, edge where it is impossible to settle: arrête, angle of instability impossible to settle (s’arrêter)

LOBL.content: think exteriority from angle of economy of the arrêt: greatest “bound” energy, bandée, tightly gathered around its own limit (Hemmung, Haltung) > immediately disseminated, sand, empty, unloaded, spontaneously: in trance of trans, ghosts, transes, folies du jour (cf. Glas on trépas, trans/partition [Derrida’s referring to Genet crossing national borderlines])
LOBL.linkedContent: think exteriority from angle of economy of the arrêt: greatest “bound” energy, bandée, tightly gathered around its own limit (Hemmung, Haltung) > immediately disseminated, sand, empty, unloaded, spontaneously: in trance of trans, ghosts, transes, folies du jour (cf. Glas on trépas, trans/partition [Derrida’s referring to Genet crossing national borderlines])

MPM.content: via de Man, figure of “defective cornerstone,” “neglected corners” > required by architecture [of system], deconstructs from w/in
MPM.linkedContent: via de Man, figure of “defective cornerstone,” “neglected corners” > required by architecture [of system], deconstructs from w/in

SH.content: Buchecker (beechmast), book corners, sharp, gaping edges of a text
SH.linkedContent: Buchecker (beechmast), book corners, sharp, gaping edges of a text

F.content: [method] the break-in technique (l’effraction) that permits one to penetrate the crypt: locating crack or lock, choosing angle of entry, and proceed by force
F.linkedContent: [method] the break-in technique (l’effraction) that permits one to penetrate the crypt: locating crack or lock, choosing angle of entry, and proceed by force

F.content: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum
F.linkedContent: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum

F.content: [angular] partitions [w/in Self] of crypt: fractures into angular pieces, arranges (aménage) cavities, corridors, zigzag labyrinths, anfractuosities, craggy (escarpées) fortifications > effects of breakages (cassures); requires light in darkness to shine on inner partition of splintered symbol (intrasymbolic not cosymbolic): each fragment conscious to itself, unconscious to ‘non-crypt’
F.linkedContent: [angular] partitions [w/in Self] of crypt: fractures into angular pieces, arranges (aménage) cavities, corridors, zigzag labyrinths, anfractuosities, craggy (escarpées) fortifications > effects of breakages (cassures); requires light in darkness to shine on inner partition of splintered symbol (intrasymbolic not cosymbolic): each fragment conscious to itself, unconscious to ‘non-crypt’

F.content: Abraham and Torok translate by setting each language at an angle w/ itself: shattered (brisée) linearity
F.linkedContent: Abraham and Torok translate by setting each language at an angle w/ itself: shattered (brisée) linearity

F.content: anasemia: 1) narrative (superposing of “account (récit)”), story, fable w/in concept 2) angle 3) sepulcher
F.linkedContent: anasemia: 1) narrative (superposing of “account (récit)”), story, fable w/in concept 2) angle 3) sepulcher

F.content: [re: Wolf Man’s cryptonomic translations] phonetic contaminations, nonsemantic associations, neither rhetorical figures nor metonymic displacements > but angular: contact (semantic or formal) w/ surface of its allosemes acc. most economical line/surface; angles make itinerary unreadable, makes cryptonomic the once inflexible logic of castration
F.linkedContent: [re: Wolf Man’s cryptonomic translations] phonetic contaminations, nonsemantic associations, neither rhetorical figures nor metonymic displacements > but angular: contact (semantic or formal) w/ surface of its allosemes acc. most economical line/surface; angles make itinerary unreadable, makes cryptonomic the once inflexible logic of castration

F.content: 2 routes (both angular) (double density) the Thing follows at dividing line (the Thing marked by same dividing line as symbol broken by crypt): 1) crosses unconscious directly (tableau, symptom) 2) crosses intrasymbolic crack (alloseme)
F.linkedContent: 2 routes (both angular) (double density) the Thing follows at dividing line (the Thing marked by same dividing line as symbol broken by crypt): 1) crosses unconscious directly (tableau, symptom) 2) crosses intrasymbolic crack (alloseme)

F.content: [Derrida’s speech]: feel on tongue angular cut of shattered word, et je sens alors, de ma langue, l’angle coupant d’un mot brisé
F.linkedContent: [Derrida’s speech]: feel on tongue angular cut of shattered word, et je sens alors, de ma langue, l’angle coupant d’un mot brisé

DS.content: double session finds its corner (coin) BTWN (ENTRE) literature & truth (that by which question “what is?” wants answering): figure of folding back, angle ensured by fold
DS.linkedContent: double session finds its corner (coin) BTWN (ENTRE) literature & truth (that by which question “what is?” wants answering): figure of folding back, angle ensured by fold

DS.content: certain mimic inscribes a graft in one corner, holding antre open
DS.linkedContent: certain mimic inscribes a graft in one corner, holding antre open

DS.content: sum can’t be totalized, nor is this non-totalizing exceeded by infinite richness of content of meaning or intention > define the limit otherwise: fold w/ no possibility of folding text back on itself (angle & intersection of re-mark), no reduction of its spacing > blank, fold: impossibility of (imaginary) theme beyond textual instance > these textual effects rich w/ kind of poverty, singular/regular monotony, disappear: one can’t see this because one thinks one is seeing themes
DS.linkedContent: sum can’t be totalized, nor is this non-totalizing exceeded by infinite richness of content of meaning or intention > define the limit otherwise: fold w/ no possibility of folding text back on itself (angle & intersection of re-mark), no reduction of its spacing > blank, fold: impossibility of (imaginary) theme beyond textual instance > these textual effects rich w/ kind of poverty, singular/regular monotony, disappear: one can’t see this because one thinks one is seeing themes

DS.content: crisis of literature est marquée au coin de cet excès > figure of corner testifies to this in all its recastings/retemperings (corner, coin, angle, seal, fold, hymen, open recess, etc.)
DS.linkedContent: crisis of literature est marquée au coin de cet excès > figure of corner testifies to this in all its recastings/retemperings (corner, coin, angle, seal, fold, hymen, open recess, etc.)

DS.content: Mallarmé’s play (on “plume,” on “winds [brise]”) anathema to thematization, to deciphering meaning > coin-entre
DS.linkedContent: Mallarmé’s play (on “plume,” on “winds [brise]”) anathema to thematization, to deciphering meaning > coin-entre

DS.content: [quoting Mallarmé] rhythm, literary game par excellence: mimic suspense/laughter—rhythmic cadence, or case, all the falls, the silent fall of pen
DS.linkedContent: [quoting Mallarmé] rhythm, literary game par excellence: mimic suspense/laughter—rhythmic cadence, or case, all the falls, the silent fall of pen

POS.content: DS re-marks a nerve, fold, angle, doubled fold of undecidable, a mark marks both marked and the mark, re-marked site of mark, can’t be counted on list of themes—hollow is the relief: hymen, fold, square, blank, margin, supernumber, column, air, chandelier
POS.linkedContent: DS re-marks a nerve, fold, angle, doubled fold of undecidable, a mark marks both marked and the mark, re-marked site of mark, can’t be counted on list of themes—hollow is the relief: hymen, fold, square, blank, margin, supernumber, column, air, chandelier

POS.content: dissemination is play of castration w/out metaphysical/romantic pathos of negativity > dissemination “is” angle of play of castration
POS.linkedContent: dissemination is play of castration w/out metaphysical/romantic pathos of negativity > dissemination “is” angle of play of castration

P.content: effects of deconstructed frame would not be an absence of one, l’abîme [undo the frame] en coin dans ses angles et ses articulations, slyly—see picture from the side of the wood (not teleological, not harmony, internal becomes external); thickness taken into account
P.linkedContent: effects of deconstructed frame would not be an absence of one, l’abîme [undo the frame] en coin dans ses angles et ses articulations, slyly—see picture from the side of the wood (not teleological, not harmony, internal becomes external); thickness taken into account

P.content: practice of fiction must guard against being reappropriated w/in metaphysical truth, show up remnants of angle in round frames (spirit as round form for Hegel)
P.linkedContent: practice of fiction must guard against being reappropriated w/in metaphysical truth, show up remnants of angle in round frames (spirit as round form for Hegel)

O.content: dissemination: generalizes theory/practice of graft w/out proper body, skew w/out straight line [?], bias w/out front [Nietzsche perspectivism?]
O.linkedContent: dissemination: generalizes theory/practice of graft w/out proper body, skew w/out straight line [?], bias w/out front [Nietzsche perspectivism?]

O.content: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding
O.linkedContent: [nonsynonymous synonyms] > never enclosed in finite taxonomy > no lexicon as such, can’t be pinned to a point, marks of dissemination, undecidable acc. 2 of binary opposition, not sublatable into 3 of speculative dialectics > displaced along angle of certain re-folding

O.content: dissemination displaces 3 of ontotheology along angle of a certain refolding (re-ploiement)
O.linkedContent: dissemination displaces 3 of ontotheology along angle of a certain refolding (re-ploiement)

O.content: Derrida places logic of veil alongside that of corner > prelude, en passant, improbably place of dissemination
O.linkedContent: Derrida places logic of veil alongside that of corner > prelude, en passant, improbably place of dissemination

O.content: if you wanna see for yourself, encounter by chance, enmeshed (engrenés) in some corner (coin), ce qui’l en est de la coupe or/livre
O.linkedContent: if you wanna see for yourself, encounter by chance, enmeshed (engrenés) in some corner (coin), ce qui’l en est de la coupe or/livre

SW.content: when one cannot read original language, one is lost in translations (veils, fringes or clothing, panels, wings, corners)
SW.linkedContent: when one cannot read original language, one is lost in translations (veils, fringes or clothing, panels, wings, corners)

SW.content: fur (wool) & skin (leather): tallith must be something living taken from something living worn by something living > a burying of the dead that once had possibility of auto-affection
SW.linkedContent: fur (wool) & skin (leather): tallith must be something living taken from something living worn by something living > a burying of the dead that once had possibility of auto-affection

SW.content: homogeneity of textile, heterogeneity of the sewing of corners: another book
SW.linkedContent: homogeneity of textile, heterogeneity of the sewing of corners: another book

REST.content: what if, and Derrida sees it too, they’re 2 left shoes, a double that fudges (brouille) both “pair & identity” à la fois—paralyzes directionality, fait loucher vers le diable
REST.linkedContent: what if, and Derrida sees it too, they’re 2 left shoes, a double that fudges (brouille) both “pair & identity” à la fois—paralyzes directionality, fait loucher vers le diable

REST.content: Derrida wonders if topos of abyss (a fortiori mis-en-abyme) might dampen (amortir) the angular necessity of this other topic, other pas: undecidables, la figure du voilement, du linge voilant, l’hymen, la soquette ou le bas, entre pied et chaussure
REST.linkedContent: Derrida wonders if topos of abyss (a fortiori mis-en-abyme) might dampen (amortir) the angular necessity of this other topic, other pas: undecidables, la figure du voilement, du linge voilant, l’hymen, la soquette ou le bas, entre pied et chaussure

AFR.content: the frivolous: (time of a) difference (of degree), spacing which ontology isn’t capable of, con-, de-struction are breached, line of disintegration (not straight/continuous/regular); philosophy deviates from itself, strikes itself w/ blows from outside > deconstruction is possible
AFR.linkedContent: the frivolous: (time of a) difference (of degree), spacing which ontology isn’t capable of, con-, de-struction are breached, line of disintegration (not straight/continuous/regular); philosophy deviates from itself, strikes itself w/ blows from outside > deconstruction is possible

PSSS.content: Freud on indirect methods to combat war, ruse of detour (Umweg)
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud on indirect methods to combat war, ruse of detour (Umweg)

PSSS.content: Freud advocates submitting life of drives to Diktatur der Vernunft, a Utopia > indirect stratagem of Eros/Thanatos: contrary to the cruelty drive, though cruelty knows no end
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud advocates submitting life of drives to Diktatur der Vernunft, a Utopia > indirect stratagem of Eros/Thanatos: contrary to the cruelty drive, though cruelty knows no end

PSSS.content: Freud’s indirection, oblique, angular, mediating nonstraightness: not just detour, strategic ruse, continuous transaction—but a leap, interruption, an ethical step
PSSS.linkedContent: Freud’s indirection, oblique, angular, mediating nonstraightness: not just detour, strategic ruse, continuous transaction—but a leap, interruption, an ethical step

D.content: liminary question, Medusa, stone, flange, pierre d’angle et d’attente (cornerstone, toothing stone) > other enumeration, squarely written, remains in reserve, undecipherable
D.linkedContent: liminary question, Medusa, stone, flange, pierre d’angle et d’attente (cornerstone, toothing stone) > other enumeration, squarely written, remains in reserve, undecipherable

D.content: [let’s mark in hollow, mute, invisible angle] statistical accumulation of “quotations,” [like constraints of that angle] accumulation as feigning to present the text > “this” text & all that touches it—still “that” text; generalized simulacrum: intertext of 2 fictions (btwn primary text & commentary) [Derrida will call D “this” text w/ a certain irony]
D.linkedContent: [let’s mark in hollow, mute, invisible angle] statistical accumulation of “quotations,” [like constraints of that angle] accumulation as feigning to present the text > “this” text & all that touches it—still “that” text; generalized simulacrum: intertext of 2 fictions (btwn primary text & commentary) [Derrida will call D “this” text w/ a certain irony]

D.content: passage toward other, se resserrer (fitting itself) into the angles btwn the surfaces, dans l’entre-surface [inter(sur)face] > articulation of one surface sur l’autre (d’un temps sur l’autre) ——angle: night, blue passage of all tenses into each other, la torsion (twist)
D.linkedContent: passage toward other, se resserrer (fitting itself) into the angles btwn the surfaces, dans l’entre-surface [inter(sur)face] > articulation of one surface sur l’autre (d’un temps sur l’autre) ——angle: night, blue passage of all tenses into each other, la torsion (twist)

D.content: Derrida’s text: re-marks passage [in Soller’s], repeats square by closing angle, opens another surface of writing to-come: play w/ cardo, hinge, cardinal points; remarque d’angle: all lines broken
D.linkedContent: Derrida’s text: re-marks passage [in Soller’s], repeats square by closing angle, opens another surface of writing to-come: play w/ cardo, hinge, cardinal points; remarque d’angle: all lines broken

D.content: by a folding-back (reploiement) or internal angle of surface: face (frons scaenae) contemplates itself as unconditioned opening of appearance, but explains itself as surface-effect, as conditioned [by square apparatus]
D.linkedContent: by a folding-back (reploiement) or internal angle of surface: face (frons scaenae) contemplates itself as unconditioned opening of appearance, but explains itself as surface-effect, as conditioned [by square apparatus]

D.content: present can only present itself by relating back to itself [folding back on itself], (com)plying with itself (en se pliant à soi) dans l’angle, along la brisure: a “crack (faille)” created by a joint, hinge
D.linkedContent: present can only present itself by relating back to itself [folding back on itself], (com)plying with itself (en se pliant à soi) dans l’angle, along la brisure: a “crack (faille)” created by a joint, hinge

D.content: possibility (potency) of present is its own limit, inner fold, impossibility—its impotence (btwn presence/castration) > same goes for “history,” “form”: language of metaphysics
D.linkedContent: possibility (potency) of present is its own limit, inner fold, impossibility—its impotence (btwn presence/castration) > same goes for “history,” “form”: language of metaphysics

D.content: each germ is its own term—finds its term w/in itself as its own internal limit, faisant angle avec sa proper mort [tracing, grafting, semen already swarming (essaimée)]
D.linkedContent: each germ is its own term—finds its term w/in itself as its own internal limit, faisant angle avec sa proper mort [tracing, grafting, semen already swarming (essaimée)]

D.content: to write means to graft (same word), each grafted text radiates toward the site of its removal, s’y régénèrent dans la répétition, à la bordure d’un surjet (overcast seam)
D.linkedContent: to write means to graft (same word), each grafted text radiates toward the site of its removal, s’y régénèrent dans la répétition, à la bordure d’un surjet (overcast seam)

D.content: discrete violence of incision not apparent in thickness of text [cf. EJQB p. 78]
D.linkedContent: discrete violence of incision not apparent in thickness of text [cf. EJQB p. 78]

D.content: each angle of square belongs to totality of surface, but multiplies it by folding back on itself, fractures it [the surface]—leaving room for supplementary attending (d’assistance) surface
D.linkedContent: each angle of square belongs to totality of surface, but multiplies it by folding back on itself, fractures it [the surface]—leaving room for supplementary attending (d’assistance) surface

D.content: same w/ supernumerary (surnombre) (column of words): is part of the numeral and belongs (appartient) to very milieu it exceeds
D.linkedContent: same w/ supernumerary (surnombre) (column of words): is part of the numeral and belongs (appartient) to very milieu it exceeds

+R.content: “the angle is always for me the edge of a tomb (un bord de tombe)”
+R.linkedContent: “the angle is always for me the edge of a tomb (un bord de tombe)”

+R.content: plus d’air, plus r [+R]; each letter, especially gl: re-marks the slippery surface, angled word, edge of tomb, hooked (crochue) signature > each letter, bit or piece of word (mors ou morceau de mot) written w/ 2 hands
+R.linkedContent: plus d’air, plus r [+R]; each letter, especially gl: re-marks the slippery surface, angled word, edge of tomb, hooked (crochue) signature > each letter, bit or piece of word (mors ou morceau de mot) written w/ 2 hands

+R.content: gl of “angle”: wild, almost unnarratable event, not a morpheme, close to piercing (trouer) a hole in the arthron [articulation, joint], patch of color in graphesis, the trait in color, a rebel to appeased commerce (regulated exchange of 2 elements [lexical, pictural])
+R.linkedContent: gl of “angle”: wild, almost unnarratable event, not a morpheme, close to piercing (trouer) a hole in the arthron [articulation, joint], patch of color in graphesis, the trait in color, a rebel to appeased commerce (regulated exchange of 2 elements [lexical, pictural])

C.content: work of the angle (RECTIFIES in all senses) resounds on more than one surface: kills, repairs, restores, recaptures, then once more (inexhaustible debt until the échéance of a dice throw)
C.linkedContent: work of the angle (RECTIFIES in all senses) resounds on more than one surface: kills, repairs, restores, recaptures, then once more (inexhaustible debt until the échéance of a dice throw)

E.content: once inserted into another network, the “same” philosopheme is no longer the same > inversely, “unique and original (inédits)” philosophemes, if there are any, once they enter network of inherited philosophemes, they’re affected over their whole surface and under every angle > the very project of rigorous criteria for judging philosophical specificity, which we are nowhere near disposing of, belongs to a set of conditions (un ensemble)—that remains to be thought
E.linkedContent: once inserted into another network, the “same” philosopheme is no longer the same > inversely, “unique and original (inédits)” philosophemes, if there are any, once they enter network of inherited philosophemes, they’re affected over their whole surface and under every angle > the very project of rigorous criteria for judging philosophical specificity, which we are nowhere near disposing of, belongs to a set of conditions (un ensemble)—that remains to be thought

BSi.content: [method in seminar] experience w/ you, and reconnoiter the corner turned
BSi.linkedContent: [method in seminar] experience w/ you, and reconnoiter the corner turned

OG.content: “fermons l’angle et pénétrons dans la texte”—to where writing is named
OG.linkedContent: “fermons l’angle et pénétrons dans la texte”—to where writing is named

EU.content: [re: CIPH] translation: transferential, diagonal, transversal, interscientific research

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s speculation] non-simplicity, indirectness > relation btwn pleasure/unpleasure not simple correlation of decrease/increase of (free) energy: inexhaustible reserve for speculation: not substantial riches, but supplementary angles
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s speculation] non-simplicity, indirectness > relation btwn pleasure/unpleasure not simple correlation of decrease/increase of (free) energy: inexhaustible reserve for speculation: not substantial riches, but supplementary angles

FV.content: basted effect of certain footnotes, animal-machines camouflaged in shadows (prudently left in corners)—threatening security of a space & a logic
FV.linkedContent: basted effect of certain footnotes, animal-machines camouflaged in shadows (prudently left in corners)—threatening security of a space & a logic
